SectionBody.Text: Unless otherwise provided by a specific section or the context otherwise requires, as used in ss. 379.3011, 379.3012, 379.3751, and 379.3752, the following definitions shall apply:

Subsection.Text: “Alligator” means a member of the species of alligator (Alligator mississippiensis) but does not mean its eggs.
“Alligator hatchling” means a juvenile alligator as more specifically defined by commission rule.
“Process” or “processing” means the skinning, butchering, or possession of alligators.
